text: vai ya#j~jAyuqdhA#ni yaqj~jamEqvAva# ruqndhE&thO# Eqtadvai yaqj~jasya# rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqva yaqj~jamava# rundhE &vaBRuqthaSca# mE svagAkAqraSca# maq ityA#ha svaqgAkRu#tyA aqgniSca# mE GaqrmaSca# maq ityA#haiqtad vai bra#hmavarcaqsasya# rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqva bra#hmavarcaqsamava# rundhaq Rukca# mEq sAma# ca maq ityA#haiq - [  ] 40
